title: hilander1981
author: hilander1981
content: Hello!I have paypal funds daily, i can buy something for you online via paypal, like ebook, tutorial, proxies, subscriptions, dedicated servers, etc.. i don't want send funds as friends option to avoid my paypal account limitations. I prefer small amounts: 50-200$ per single transaction. Also i can pay invoices via paypal. I need 60-70% to crypto... Can go first to old members...If you have any ideas or any offers please buzz me in telegram.https://t.me/viver355

comments.author: JeromeTash
comments.body: So how are you going to do that bit of subscription, let's say, of TradingView paid plans?Are you going to ask for a member's account log in credentials so that you can make the subscription through the account? I don't think this is a good move security wise.Also, another issue is privacy. How do you go about this?
